name: Tilt-shift Maker
description:
A daily experiment post (file contains no instructions)

An editable tilt-shift filter using layer blur and a single source component. Can be used to manipulate scale in photos and gifs by simulating pan-tilt blurring of large format photography.


Gaussian blur isn't really great for this effect, but it is interesting to see the effects of gradient masks on layer blur elements. To edit the blur effects, edit the gradient mask elements.
